metadata.description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads JSON encoded messages from Pub/Sub, uses Beam SQL to transform the message data, and writes the results to a BigQuery
metadata.name: Streaming Beam Sql

parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to write to, in the form 'project:dataset.table'.
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.name: outputTable

parameters.helpText: GCS path to write to, in the form 'gs://path'.
parameters.label: GCS output path
parameters.name: outputPath
